titleStmt.title: The pope's parliament, containing a pleasant and delightful historie, wherin are ... deliuered ... the paltry trash and trumperies of him and his pelting prelats ... : Whereunto is annexed an Anatomie of Pope Ioane, more apparently opening her whole life and storie. / Written by Iohn Mayo.
titleStmt.author: Mayo, John, fl. 1607-1629.

titleStmt.title: The pope's parliament, containing a pleasant and delightful historie, wherin are ... deliuered ... the paltry trash and trumperies of him and his pelting prelats ... : Whereunto is annexed an Anatomie of Pope Ioane, more apparently opening her whole life and storie. / Written by Iohn Mayo.
titleStmt.author: Mayo, John, fl. 1607-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Field dwelling in the Blacke Friers neare Ludgate.,

notesStmt.note: "The anatomie of Pope Ioane" (p. [29]-42) has special t.-p.
Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through, and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
